title: Prince of the Octagon - Novel Updates
author: Philip   필립
description:
Forget the UFC!

Experience all of mixed martial arts through a novel!

MMA history spanning decades.

The legend of the man who dominated the 100 square foot octagon ring.

Changgong Lee, the strongest hard puncher in history!

The unrivaled champion who would go down in MMA history!

Experience the intense pleasure for yourself now!>
